libraries.name: Animated Link
libraries.description: A link component with smooth character-by-character animation on hover. Features customizable colors and stagger timing for elegant text transitions.

libraries.name: Gooey Button
libraries.description: A button component with a gooey blob effect that creates a smooth, liquid-like animation on hover. Features customizable themes and sizes.

libraries.name: Gooey Menu
libraries.description: An interactive menu component with a gooey blob effect. Features a plus icon that expands to reveal additional menu items when clicked. Uses CSS-only animations with SVG filters for the gooey effect. Note: The gooey effect may not work properly on Safari and some mobile browsers.

references.name: amazing blob prototype by @createwithplay on X

libraries.name: Animated Entry
libraries.description: An animation component that creates a dramatic entry effect using sliding squares that reveal content. Features customizable colors, timing, and stagger effects.
